Package infodynamics.measures.discrete

This package contains Java classes for each of the information dynamics measures as applied to discrete data (ie int[] or int[][] data).
Author:
Joseph Lizier (email, www)
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ChannelCalculatorDiscrete
    A basic interface for calculators computing measures on a univariate channel for discrete (ie int[]) data from a source to a destination time-series (ie mutual information and transfer entropy).
    SingleAgentMeasureDiscrete
    Interface for calculators of information-theoretic measures for single variables (e.g.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActiveInformationCalculatorDiscrete
    Active Information Storage calculator for univariate discrete (int[]) data.
    BlockEntropyCalculatorDiscrete
    Block entropy calculator for univariate discrete (int[]) data (ie computes entropy over blocks of consecutive states in time).
    CombinedActiveEntRateCalculatorDiscrete
    A combined calculator for the active information, entropy rate and entropy.
    ConditionalMutualInformationCalculatorDiscrete
    Conditional Mutual information (MI) calculator for univariate discrete (int[]) data.
    ConditionalTransferEntropyCalculatorDiscrete
    Implements conditional transfer entropy for univariate discrete time-series data.
    ContextOfPastMeasureCalculatorDiscrete
    A base class for calculators computing measures which require knowledge of the embedded past state of a univariate discrete (ie int[]) variable.
    DualTotalCorrelationCalculatorDiscrete
    Computes the dual total correlation (DTC) of a given multivariate int[][] set of observations (extending MultiVariateInfoMeasureCalculatorDiscrete).
    EntropyCalculatorDiscrete
    Entropy calculator for univariate discrete (int[]) data.
    EntropyRateCalculatorDiscrete
    Entropy rate calculator for univariate discrete (int[]) data (ie computes entropy over blocks of consecutive states in time).
    InfoMeasureCalculatorDiscrete
    Base class for our information-theoretic calculators on discrete (int[]) data, providing common functionality for user-level measure classes.
    MultiInformationCalculatorDiscrete
    Multi-information or integration calculator for multivariate discrete data.
    MultiVariateInfoMeasureCalculatorDiscrete
    Implements a base class with common functionality for child class implementations of multivariate information measures.
    MutualInformationCalculatorDiscrete
    Mutual information (MI) calculator for univariate discrete (int[]) data.
    OInfoCalculatorDiscrete
    Computes the O-information of a given multivariate int[][] set of observations (extending MultiVariateInfoMeasureCalculatorDiscrete).
    PredictiveInformationCalculatorDiscrete
    Predictive information calculator for univariate discrete (int[]) data.
    SeparableInfoCalculatorDiscrete
    Implements separable information (see Lizier et al, 2010, below).
    SeparableInfoCalculatorDiscreteByAddition
    Implements separable information (see Lizier et al, 2010, below), by using separate Transfer Entropy and Active information storage calculators.
    SInfoCalculatorDiscrete
    Computes the S-information of a given multivariate int[][] set of observations (extending MultiVariateInfoMeasureCalculatorDiscrete).
    SingleAgentMeasureDiscreteInContextOfPastCalculator
    A base class for calculators computing measures for a single variable which require knowledge of the embedded past state of a univariate discrete (ie int[]) variable.
    TransferEntropyCalculatorDiscrete
    Implements transfer entropy for univariate discrete time-series data.
